### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal mining and processing at position(43.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position 43.0, -82.0) 
-  Furnace (position 41.0, -82.0) 
-  Burner inserter (position 43.5, -80.5) 
-  Chest (position 42.5, -83.5) 
-  Chest (position 44.5, -81.5) 
-  Chest (position 43.5, -79.5) 
-  Chest (position 45.5, -80.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items
-  Ensure the chest is not full before attempting to extract items
-  Ensure the entity has enough fuel to perform the extraction
-  Ensure the entity has the required items to extract
### Errors when using burner mining drill
-  Ensure the burner mining drill has enough fuel to operate
-  Ensure the chest at the drop position is not full
### Errors when using burner inserter
-  Ensure the burner inserter has enough fuel to operate
-  Ensure the inserter has source items to pick up
